title: Helen and Carl Egner, Class of 1910, Scholarship
Description:: The Helen and Carl Egner, Class of 1910, Scholarship is open to students attending Princeton University.

title: $1000 Cosmetology Scholarship
Description:: The $1000 Cosmetology Scholarship is open to students who are at least 18 years of age.  You must submit a YouTube video that demonstrates your creativity, passion and commitment to the field of cosmetology in order to be considered for this award.

title: Event Planning Internship
Description:: The Event Planning Internship is available to junior or senior at Central Washington University minoring or specializing in Event Planning, or related field.  You must have experience planning events, and creating marketing materials and strategies for promotion of events, good writing skills, Adobe In Design preferred but not required to be considered for this position.  As an intern, you will help organize and market events hosted by the CAH Dean’s Office.

title: Campbell and Hall Charity Fund/UNCF Scholarship
Description:: The Campbell and Hall Charity Fund/UNCF Scholarship is available to high school seniors who are planning to attend a UNCF member school.  You must be a resident of Boston and have a minimum 2.5 GPA to be eligible for this award.

title: Matelich Scholarship
Description:: The Matelich Scholarship is available entering freshmen at the University of Puget Sound.  You must demonstrate exceptional motivation, excellent academic potential, a commitment to service, outstanding integrity, and unmatched leadership potential to be considered for this award.  A minimum 3.5 GPA is also required.

title: Lillis Scholarship
Description:: The Lillis Scholarship is available to entering freshmen at the University of Puget Sound.  You must demonstrate academic excellence in high school, measured by GPA, rigor of high school curriculum, and performance on standardized exams, and written work to be considered for this award.

Provided By:: University of Rhode Island - College of the Environment and Life Sciences
title: Betty and Tom Shreve '42 Scholarship
Description:: The Betty and Tom Shreve '42 Scholarship is available to food science and nutrition majors at the University of Rhode Island.  You must demonstrate financial need to be eligible for this award.

Provided By:: University of Rhode Island - College of the Environment and Life Sciences
title: Marjorie Ellis Endowed Scholarship
Description:: The Marjorie Ellis Endowed Scholarship is available to undergraduate and graduate students majoring in nutrition and dietetics at the University of Rhode Island.

title: Hans P. Loewen Scholarship
Description:: The Hans P. Loewen Scholarship is available to graduating high-school seniors, college freshmen or sophomores pursuing a degree in Science, Technology, Engineering or Math (STEM).  You must be s U.S. citizen or permanent resident and submit an essay describing yout leadership qualities and in particular how you helped others meet their goals to be eligible for this award.

title: Howard Dayton School of Business Endowed Scholarship
Fields of Study:: Accounting, Business Management, Marketing, Sports Management
Description:: The Howard Dayton School of Business Endowed Scholarship is available to Christian students at Asbury College.  You must have a minimum GPA of 3.0, minimum test score of 24 ACT/1110 SAT and majoring in accounting, business management, marketing, and sports management to be eligible for this award.

title: $5,000 Scholarship: Collect Period Products for People in Homeless Shelters
Description:: You could win a $5,000 scholarship by collecting and donating pads and tampons for people experiencing homelessness. Mail what you collect to a local shelter (we’ll give you the address!). That’ll help make sure that everyone has what they need (during that time of the month!), and automatically enter you to win a $5,000 scholarship!
